SERVICE_CREATE.ADVENTURE_DATE_FIXED: This adventure will have a fixed date to be held?
SERVICE_CREATE.HOW_MANY: How many people you are able to meet at a time in this adventure?

SERVICE_CREATE.MIN_1: An adventure must have at least one person
SERVICE_CREATE.MIN_MORE_1000: More than 1,000 people ? Are you sure?
SERVICE_CREATE.MAX_REQUIRED: The maximum number of people you can meet in this activity should be informed . Note : It may be equal to the minimum customer
SERVICE_CREATE.ADVENTURE_AT_LEAST: The adventure should have at least
SERVICE_CREATE.DESCRIPTION_REQUIRED: You must provide a description of your adventure, a good description will increase the chances of a person contracting its activity
SERVICE_CREATE.SHORT_DESCRIPTION_REQUIRED: You must provide a brief description of the adventure , it is essential to increase the chance of a person click to see more adventure details
SERVICE_CREATE.WHAT_BRING_REQUIRED: Tell that should be taken to practice activity
SERVICE_CREATE.CITY_NOT_FOUND: No city found with that name
SERVICE_CREATE.MEETING_POINT_REQUIRED: You should inform the meeting point
SERVICE_CREATE.HOW_TO_GET_REQUIRED: You should give at least a hint of how to get to the meeting point
SERVICE_CREATE.MARKER: Mark the location that will be the meeting point
SERVICE_CREATE.INCLUDED_REQUIRED: You must tell what is included in the adventure
SERVICE_CREATE.NOT_INCLUDED_REQUIRED: You must tell what is not included in the adventure
SERVICE_CREATE.ADDITIONAL_PACKAGES_REQUIRED: The package must have a description
SERVICE_CREATE.ADDITIONAL_PACKAGES_MAX: The description can not be more than 90 characters
SERVICE_CREATE.PACKAGE_PRICE_REQUIRED: The package must have a price
